title: TrendSignalExtractor Output
description: Statistical signals extracted from the dataset.

action_verb_frequency.description: Frequency map of action verbs (e.g., crush, cut)

subject_type_frequency.description: Frequency map of subjects (e.g., hydraulic press, cat)

object_type_frequency.description: Frequency map of objects (e.g., diamond, ball)

structure_type_frequency.description: Frequency map of video structures (e.g., experiment, skit)
